other_tests.findings: Circumscribed mass of lymphoid tissue with numerous reactive germinal centers; immunohistochemical analysis showed a mixture of B and T cells.
Multifocal abnormal FDG uptake in the right thorax with SUVmax ranging from 1.4 to 2.7; no FDG-avid hilar/mediastinal lymphadenopathy or extrathoracic lesions.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Gradual and spontaneous regression of lung lesions on follow-up CT images.

other_tests.date: Follow-up at 3-, 6-, and 1-year intervals after VATS
other_tests.findings: Latest CT images showed disappearance or shrinkage of the lesions.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Normalization of the serum interleukin-2 receptor.
